title: Tommy is Back, On The Run Tour, Emmy Awards, Dherbs, Vontae Davis Retirement, Hurricane Florence, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Tommy is Back, On The Run Tour, Emmy Awards, Dherbs, Vontae Davis Retirement, Hurricane Florence, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Tommy is back and he gets roasted. The On The Run Tour went down in H-Town and Tommy and Carla got stories. The Emmys were last night. CEO A.D. Dolphin of Dherbs calls in. Vontae Davis retires from NFL at halftime. Hurricane Florence is still wreaking havoc on the Carolinas and Virginia. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about the true measure of a man and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
